message.body: (1/2) I don't know if you're looking to go to another game, but this coming Wednesday brauhaus is doing a really good deal where for thirty bucks you get normal
(2/2) beer bus plus food before you leave and a ticket to the game.
Do you know what time the game is and if the seats are near your seats
(1/2) The pre game meal at brauhaus goes from 5 to 6 and think the bus leaves then. Their website doesn't say what section the seats are in though. But i also j
(2/2) ust saw that if we win you get a free ticket to another game.
Good deal, let me know if you end up going
Cool I am definitely interested and will let you know if I go. Thanks for the heads up
Hey we got tickets for Wednesday !
Sounds like it will be fun
